A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think the movie did what it was meant to accomplish. I know people aren't happy with how it ended for Luke but his purpose was served and made Rey a Jedi in the force. The only concern/more like interest is to see how they decide what to do with Leia's character. It is deeply saddening about Carrie Fisher and they have to give respect to her and the character. After this last movie I would like to know how they originally wanted to go with Leia and the movie.
